parameters.name: pipeline_id
parameters.description: (string) The pipeline to return updates for.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Page token returned by previous call

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Max number of entries to return in a single page.

parameters.name: until_update_id
parameters.description: If present, returns updates until and including this update_id.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: List updates for an active pipeline.
